title: Hotline to inform about issues in obtaining medicinal drugs
body_lines: The Ministry of Health has initiated a special program to address the issues in procuring medicinal drugs, says the Health Minister Prof. Channa Jayasumana.
Thereby, the 1999 hotline of Suwaseriya service has been introduced for the general public to inform about any issues pertaining to obtaining them.
Shortages of medicinal drugs are reported in many parts of the country.
